title: r/Askreddit What's The Craziest Thing You've Seen A Coworker Get Away With?
description:
r/Askreddit You think you've got crazy coworkers? Just wait until you hear the stories of these Reddit users describing their insane, unstable, and downright ridiculous coworkers. We've got stories of people literally beating up coworkers, yet somehow they still don't get fired! If you like this podcast and you want to see more, follow my podcast for more daily Reddit content!
